entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Invermere
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
